snippet: An early upsurge ended with a report on a widening trade deficit in the United States and higher unemployment in Greece.
abstract: Stocks remain flat despite an encouraging new jobs report and worrisome developments in the global economy.
lead_paragraph: An early upsurge ended with a report on a widening trade deficit in the United States and higher unemployment in Greece.

headline.seo: Markets End Flat After an Early Rally Fades
headline.main: Markets End Flat After an Early Rally Fades
headline.print_headline: Markets End Flat After an Early Rally Fades
